content: त्वच् {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Skin(of men, serpents &c.); <ls>U. 4. 20</ls>; <ls>Mv. 1. 18.</ls> {@--2@} Hide (as of a cow, deer &c.); <ls>R. 3. 31.</ls> {@--3@} Bark, rind; <ls>Ku. 1. 7</ls>; <ls>R. 2</ls>, <ls n="R.">37</ls>, <ls n="R.">17. 12.</ls> {@--4@} Any cover or coating. {@--5@} The sense of touch.
